珵字的基本解释

珵
chéng
美玉：“览察草木其犹未得兮，岂珵美之能当？”
佩玉。

珵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chéng］
［《廣韻》直貞切，平清，澄。］
美玉。
[②]［tǐng］
［《集韻》他頂切，上迥，透。］
通“珽1”。
玉笏。

珵字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珵； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页732第06
【廣韻】直貞切【集韻】【韻會】馳貞切，?音呈。【玉篇】美玉也。埋六寸，光自輝。【廣韻】玉名。【集韻】佩玉也。珩謂之珵。一曰玉大六寸。【相玉書】大六寸，光自照。【屈原·離騷】覽察草木其猶未得兮，豈珵美之能當。【註】珵，美玉也。音呈。一曰佩珩也。　又【集韻】他頂切。與珽同。大圭長二尺。【禮·玉藻】天子搢珽。【釋文】珽，他頂反。本又作珵。

珵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
珵字的起名意思

美玉；佩玉。

chéng

["Guangyun" straight cut, clear and clear. ]
Beautiful jade.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection] [Jade Character Department] 　珵; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 732 06
[Guang Yun] Zhizheng cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Chizhen cut, sound is present. [Jade articles] Beautiful jade. Buried six inches, glorious. [Guang Yun] Yu name. [Jiyun] Peiyu also. Heng is called zhi hui. One said that the size of jade is six inches. 【Xiangyushu】Large six inches, self-illuminated. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] Seeing and inspecting the vegetation is still inexhaustible, and it can be regarded as beautiful. 【Note】Yuan, Meiyu is also. The sound was. One said, Peiheng.　[Ji Yun] He cuts the end. Same as Jue. Dagui is two feet long. 【Rite·Yuzao】The emperor slaps on the rope. [Explanation] Jue, he opposes. This is made again.
